setGuard(address).details: Set a guard that checks Safe transactions before and after execution.      This can only be done via a Safe transaction.      ⚠️⚠️⚠️ IMPORTANT: Since a guard has full power to block Safe transaction execution,      a broken guard can cause a denial of service for the Safe. Make sure to carefully      audit the guard code and design recovery mechanisms. ⚠️⚠️⚠️

params.guard: The address of the guard to be used or the 0 address to disable the guard

setGuard(address).notice: Set Transaction Guard `guard` for the Safe. Make sure you trust the guard.
